languages.text: {n}Кибелла испытующе смотрит на вас, затем достает флакон с алой жидкостью и проливает ее в чарку.{/n} "Кровь дюжины мучеников. Смешанная с их слезами, освященная предсмертными молитвами, собранная с последними вздохами. Едва ли сей артефакт сравнится по силе с кровью Домин, но раз ты отказываешься даровать свою... Этого должно быть достаточно, чтобы ритуал свершился".

{n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла испытующе смотрит на вас, затем достает флакон с алой жидкостью и проливает ее в чарку.{/n} "Кровь дюжины мучеников. Смешанная с их слезами, освященная предсмертными молитвами, собранная с последними вздохами. Едва ли сей артефакт сравнится по силе с кровью Домин, но раз ты отказываешься даровать свою... Этого должно быть достаточно, чтобы ритуал свершился".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you testily, then pulls out a vial of scarlet liquid and pours it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs. Mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as Enim's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... That should be enough for the ritual to commence."

{n}Kibellah looks at you testily, then pulls out a vial of scarlet liquid and pours it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs. Mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as Enim's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... That should be enough for the ritual to commence."

{n}Kibellah looks at you testily before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as Enim's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... There, that should suffice for the ritual to commence."

{n}Kibellah looks at you testily before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as Enim's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... There, that should suffice for the ritual to commence."

{n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

{n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich intensiv an, bevor sie eine Phiole mit einer roten Flüssigkeit hervorholt und diese in den Becher gießt.{/n} "Das Blut eines Dutzends Märtyrer, gemischt mit ihren Tränen, geheiligt durch ihre Todesgebete und gesammelt bei ihrem letzten Atemzug. Dieses Artefakt ist längst nicht so mächtig wie das Blut {mf|des|der} Domin, aber da Ihr Eures nicht geben wollt ... sollte es für das Ritual ausreichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich intensiv an, bevor sie eine Phiole mit einer roten Flüssigkeit hervorholt und diese in den Becher gießt.{/n} "Das Blut eines Dutzends Märtyrer, gemischt mit ihren Tränen, geheiligt durch ihre Todesgebete und gesammelt bei ihrem letzten Atemzug. Dieses Artefakt ist längst nicht so mächtig wie das Blut {mf|des|der} Domin, aber da Ihr Eures nicht geben wollt ... sollte es für das Ritual ausreichen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente antes de sacar un vial de líquido escarlata y verterlo en la copa.{/n} «La sangre de una docena de mártires, mezclada con sus lágrimas, santificada por sus últimas oraciones y recogida durante su último aliento. Este artefacto dista mucho de la potencia de su sangre, Domin, pero si se niega a entregarla... con esto debería bastar para dar comienzo al ritual».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente antes de sacar un vial de líquido escarlata y verterlo en la copa.{/n} «La sangre de una docena de mártires, mezclada con sus lágrimas, santificada por sus últimas oraciones y recogida durante su último aliento. Este artefacto dista mucho de la potencia de su sangre, Domin, pero si se niega a entregarla... con esto debería bastar para dar comienzo al ritual».

languages.text: {n}キベラはこちらをじっと見つめて、緋色の液体が入った小瓶を取り出し、カップに注いだ。{/n}「十数人の殉教者の血を、彼らの涙と混ぜ合わせるわ。彼らの死に際の祈りで清めて、死ぬ直前に集めたものよ。このアーティファクトはドミンの血ほど強力とは言えないけれど、あなたが血を捧げることを拒むのなら…儀式を始めるくらいならこれで十分だわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはこちらをじっと見つめて、緋色の液体が入った小瓶を取り出し、カップに注いだ。{/n}「十数人の殉教者の血を、彼らの涙と混ぜ合わせるわ。彼らの死に際の祈りで清めて、死ぬ直前に集めたものよ。このアーティファクトはエニムの血ほど強力とは言えないけれど、あなたが血を捧げることを拒むのなら…儀式を始めるくらいならこれで十分だわ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈专注地看着你，随后取出一小瓶猩红色的液体，倒入仪式用杯。{/n}“这是十几位殉道者的鲜血，混杂着他们的眼泪，在他们最后的祈祷中得到圣化，在他们最后的呼吸中融为一体。这件圣物远远不如秘者的鲜血强大，但既然你不愿献出自己的鲜血……那这件替代品应该也足够用来举行仪式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈专注地看着你，随后取出一小瓶猩红色的液体，倒入仪式用杯。{/n}“这是十几位殉道者的鲜血，混杂着他们的眼泪，在他们最后的祈祷中得到圣化，在他们最后的呼吸中融为一体。这件圣物远远不如秘者的鲜血强大，但既然你不愿献出自己的鲜血……那这件替代品应该也足够用来举行仪式。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous dévisage longuement avant de tirer une fiole contenant un liquide pourpre qu'elle verse dans la coupe.{/n} « Voici le sang d'une dizaine de martyrs, mêlé à leurs larmes, sanctifié par leurs ultimes prières, et recueilli à leur dernier soupir. Cet artéfact est loin d'être aussi puissant que le sang {mf|du|de la} Domin, mais puisque vous refusez de verser le vôtre... celui-ci devrait suffire pour commencer le rituel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah vous dévisage longuement avant de tirer une fiole contenant un liquide pourpre qu'elle verse dans la coupe.{/n} « Voici le sang d'une dizaine de martyrs, mêlé à leurs larmes, sanctifié par leurs ultimes prières, et recueilli à leur dernier soupir. Cet artéfact est loin d'être aussi puissant que le sang {mf|du|de la} Domin, mais puisque vous refusez de verser le vôtre... celui-ci devrait suffire pour commencer le rituel. »

languages.text: {n}Sana dikkatle bakan Kibellah, bir şişe çıkarıp içindeki kızıl renkli sıvıyı çanağa boşaltmaya başlıyor.{/n} "On kadar şehidin son dualarıyla kutsanan ve son nefeslerini verirken toplanan, gözyaşlarıyla karışmış kanı. Bu, Domin'in kanı kadar güçlü olmasa da kanını akıtmayı reddettiğinden ötürü... Ayinin başlaması için kâfi gelecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you intently before pulling out a vial of scarlet liquid and pouring it out into the cup.{/n} "The blood of a dozen martyrs, mixed with their tears, sanctified by their dying prayers, and gathered at their final breath. This artefact is hardly as powerful as the Domin's blood, but since you refuse to give yours... this should suffice for the ritual to commence."
